quote: The American educational psychologist Patricia Alexander has expressed the view that fear paralyses and curiosity empowers. Accordingly, she reasons, we should always be more interested than afraid.
quote_letters: THE AMERICAN EDUCATIONAL PSYCHOLOGIST PATRICIA ALEXANDER HAS EXPRESSED THE VIEW THAT FEAR PARALYSES AND CURIOSITY EMPOWERS ACCORDINGLY SHE REASONS WE SHOULD ALWAYS BE MORE INTERESTED THAN AFRAID
